titleStmt.title: Digital description of MS. Heb. b. 8

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, vol. ii, by Adolf Neubauer and Arthur Ernest Cowley, Oxford 1906, No. 2816.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions). Contact specialcollections.enquiries@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript

msItem.title: A colophon
msItem.note: beg. זה המחזור שלארבעה נביאים האחרנים מה שקנה [ר̇] מבשר בן [ר̇] מבורך בן מבשר בן סהל העני נ̇ע̇...; some scribbling in Arabic in the margin;

msItem.title: A Masoretic fragment, headed אלין פסקתא דכוליה קריה. אוריתא צ̇ד̇. בראשית כ̇ט̇
msItem.note: ending with אלה הדברים כ̇ב̇, incomplete.

physDesc.p: Syr. Rabb. char.; 3 coll., fol., vellum, injured.

history.provenance: Owner: Mebhasser b. Mebhorakh b. Mebhasser.
history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: A Masoretic fragment
msItem.note: much injured and obliterated, containing alphabetical lists of words with the passages in which they occur, beg. with the words beg. with ומ, followed by those beg. withכְ and לְ. The first legible line is ומראשית. כבד את יי̇ מהונך ומראשית. Verso blank.

physDesc.p: Syr. curs. char.; 4 coll., fol., vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).
